title: Public Relations Manager
summary: Foresight ventures is seeking qualified candidates for the position of Public Relations Manager. This position will be responsible for developing and executing Foresight’s PR campaign strategy. This role requires experience in international branding and public relations. non-crypto background accepted as well.
